title: Divya Ratna Haaram: Ruby & Diamond Statement Necklace
features: A stunning statement necklace showcasing delicate floral motifs paved with shimmering diamonds. Features two prominent pear cut ruby as the focal point. Exquisite Hyderabadi craftsmanship with modern styling. The necklace consists of detailed floral open work with individual setting of each diamond.
description: This Divya Ratna Haaram is a breathtaking blend of traditional elegance and contemporary design. The exceptional craftsmanship, coupled with the brilliance of the diamonds and the richness of the rubies, creates a captivating piece that is sure to make a lasting impression. A true heirloom to be cherished for generations.
